definitions: Put (a seed, bulb, or plant) in the ground to grow.
Place or fix in a specified position.
Establish (an idea or suggestion) in someone's mind.
Place (a bomb or other device) in a hidden position.
Place oneself firmly in a position.
examples: She planted the rose bushes in the garden.
He planted a kiss on her cheek.
The spy planted the bug in the office.
They planted the flag on the summit.
He planted himself in front of the television.
